Class ClientSettingsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.client.ClientSettingsBuilder

  • public class ClientSettingsBuilder
extends Object
    The ClientSettingsBuilder is used to build new immutable ClientSettings.
